When you are poised to Strike from hiding, you may roll +shadow. If you do, choose one (before rolling).

  • Strike true: Reroll any dice.
  • Strike hard: Mark progress on a hit.

On a strong hit with a match, you also remain totally undetected; take +2 momentum and add +1 on your next Strike.
Module

Vehicle Bay

You may purchase or upgrade a support vehicle for 1 less experience. When you Repair a battered support vehicle, spend 1 repair point (instead of 2).

When a support vehicle is destroyed, and you are able to retrieve its wreckage, you may Ask the Oracle using the yes/no table if something can be salvaged from the mess. Make it '50/50'. On a yes, spend 2 experience to restore the support vehicle asset with all previously marked abilities. Until you Repair and bring it back to full working order, the vehicle is battered with 0 integrity.

When you make a move to launch from or land on your command vehicle in a perilous situation or environment, reroll any dice and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Module

Workshop

When you Repair in the field, add +1.

When you make a move in your workshop to craft, modify, deactivate, or disassemble a device or machine, you may reroll your action die if its value is less than your vehicle's integrity.

When you Swear an Iron Vow to undertake a long-term engineering project (extreme or greater), reroll any dice. When you obtain a crucial part or resource, mark progress on the quest and take +2 momentum. When you devote extended time to the project in your workshop, Face Danger and add +1. On a hit, mark progress. On a strong hit with a match, mark progress twice. When you Fulfill Your Vow and score a hit, mark one extra box on your quests legacy track.

Support Vehicles

Support Vehicle

Exosuit

Your lumbering rig houses one pilot, is sealed against hostile environments, and is armed with fixed or held weapons. When you make a forceful, damaging, or resistant move, you may (after rolling) replace the value of your action die with the rig's integrity; if you do, Lose Momentum (-1).

Your exosuit is equipped with thrusters. You can maneuver in zero-g, make thrust-assisted leaps, and drop to a surface from altitude. When you burn fuel to overcome a critical obstacle (decide after rolling), you may reroll any dice. If you do, Sacrifice Resources (-1).

When you Withstand Damage, you may reroll one challenge die.
Support Vehicle

Hoverbike

Your unarmed hoverbike provides speedy planetside ground transport, and is equipped to carry up to two people and their gear. When you Underake an Expedition (+edge), take +1 momentum on a hit. On a strong hit with a match, you also surge ahead or find a new path; mark progress.

Support Vehicle

Rover

Support Vehicle

{{oracle-table-move-take-decisive-action}}
{{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-take-decisive-action 1 40}} It’s worse than you thought: You or an ally make a suffer move (-2) {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-take-decisive-action 1 40}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-take-decisive-action 41 52}} The victory is short-lived: A new peril or foe is revealed {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-take-decisive-action 41 52}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-take-decisive-action 53 64}} You face collateral damage: Something is lost, damaged, or broken {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-take-decisive-action 53 64}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-take-decisive-action 65 76}} Others pay the price: Someone else suffers the cost {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-take-decisive-action 65 76}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-take-decisive-action 77 88}} Others won’t forget: You are marked for vengeance {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-take-decisive-action 77 88}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-take-decisive-action 89 100}} It gets complicated: The true nature of a foe or objective is revealed {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-take-decisive-action 89 100}}
{{/oracle-table-move-take-decisive-action}} {{#oracle-table-move-endure-harm}}
{{oracle-table-move-endure-harm}}
{{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-endure-harm 1 10}} You suffer mortal harm. <u>Face Death</u>. {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-endure-harm 1 10}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-endure-harm 11 20}} You are dying. Within an hour or two, you must <u>Heal</u> and raise your health above 0, or <u>Face Death</u>. {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-endure-harm 11 20}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-endure-harm 21 35}} You are unconscious and out of action. If left alone, you come back to your senses in an hour or two. If you are vulnerable to ongoing harm, <u>Face Death</u>. {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-endure-harm 21 35}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-endure-harm 36 50}} You are reeling and fighting to stay conscious. If you engage in any vigorous activity before taking a breather for a few minutes, roll on this table again (before resolving the other move). {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-endure-harm 36 50}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-endure-harm 51 100}} You are still standing. {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-endure-harm 51 100}}
{{/oracle-table-move-endure-harm}} {{#oracle-table-move-endure-stress}}
{{oracle-table-move-endure-stress}}
{{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-endure-stress 1 10}} You are overwhelmed. <u>Face Desolation</u>. {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-endure-stress 1 10}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-endure-stress 11 25}} You give up. <u>Forsake Your Vow</u>. {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-endure-stress 11 25}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-endure-stress 26 50}} You give in to fear or compulsion, and act against your better instincts. {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-endure-stress 26 50}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-endure-stress 51 100}} You persevere. {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-endure-stress 51 100}}
{{/oracle-table-move-endure-stress}} {{#oracle-table-move-withstand-damage}}
{{oracle-table-move-withstand-damage}}
{{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-withstand-damage 1 10}} Immediate catastrophic destruction. All aboard must <u>Endure Harm</u> or <u>Face Death</u>, as appropriate. {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-withstand-damage 1 10}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-withstand-damage 11 25}} Destruction is imminent and unavoidable. If you do not have the means or intention to get clear, <u>Endure Harm</u> or <u>Face Death</u> as appropriate. {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-withstand-damage 11 25}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-withstand-damage 26 40}} Destruction is imminent, but can be averted if you <u>Repair</u> your vehicle and raise its integrity above 0. If you fail, see 11-25. {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-withstand-damage 26 40}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-withstand-damage 41 55}} You cannot <u>Repair</u> this vehicle until you <u>Resupply</u> and obtain a crucial replacement part. If you roll this result again prior to that, see 11-25. {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-withstand-damage 41 55}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-withstand-damage 56 70}} The vehicle is crippled or out of your control. To get it back in action, you must <u>Repair</u> and raise its integrity above 0. {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-withstand-damage 56 70}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-withstand-damage 71 85}} It’s a rough ride. All aboard suffer must make the <u>Endure Harm</u>, <u>Endure Stress</u>, or <u>Companion Takes a Hit</u> move, suffering a serious (-2) cost. {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-withstand-damage 71 85}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-withstand-damage 86 95}} You’ve lost fuel, energy, or cargo. <u>Sacrifice Resources</u> (-2). {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-withstand-damage 86 95}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-withstand-damage 96 100}} Against all odds, the vehicle holds together. {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-withstand-damage 96 100}}
{{/oracle-table-move-withstand-damage}} {{#oracle-table-move-pay-the-price}}
{{oracle-table-move-pay-the-price}}
{{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 1 2}} A trusted individual or community acts against you {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 1 2}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 3 4}} An individual or community you care about is exposed to danger {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 3 4}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 5 7}} You encounter signs of a looming threat {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 5 7}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 8 10}} You create an opportunity for an enemy {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 8 10}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 11 14}} You face a tough choice {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 11 14}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 15 18}} You face the consequences of an earlier choice {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 15 18}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 19 22}} A surprising development complicates your quest {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 19 22}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 23 26}} You are separated from something or someone {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 23 26}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 27 32}} Your action causes collateral damage or has an unintended effect {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 27 32}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 33 38}} Something of value is lost or destroyed {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 33 38}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 39 44}} The environment or terrain introduces a new hazard {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 39 44}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 45 50}} A new enemy is revealed {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 45 50}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 51 56}} A friend, companion, or ally is in harm’s way (or you are, if alone) {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 51 56}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 57 62}} Your equipment or vehicle malfunctions {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 57 62}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 63 68}} Your vehicle suffers damage {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 63 68}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 69 74}} You waste resources {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 69 74}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 75 81}} You are harmed {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 75 81}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 82 88}} You are stressed {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 82 88}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 89 95}} You are delayed or put at a disadvantage {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 89 95}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 96 100}} Roll twice {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-move-pay-the-price 96 100}}

beacon with useful data (LORE HUNTER, SCAVENGER) {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-space-opportunity 81 84}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-space-opportunity 85 88}} Refuge offers a place to hide, plan, or {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-space-opportunity 89 92}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-space-opportunity 93 96}} Sensors reveal helpful or interesting environmental data (LORE HUNTER, SCAVENGER) {{/rollBetween() oracle-table-space-opportunity 93 96}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-table-space-opportunity 97 100}} Vehicle or equipment performs beyond expectations (LORE HUNTER, SCAVENGER) {{oracle-subcategory-planet-desert-world}}
{{#rollTotal() tableChoice 0}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-subcategory-planet-desert-world 1 10}} None / thin (This planet is airless, or it's atmosphere is so thin as to be useless for humans.) {{/rollBetween() oracle-subcategory-planet-desert-world 1 10}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-subcategory-planet-desert-world 11 25}} Toxic (This planet's atmosphere is not compatible with human life. Exploring this place will require a sealed environment or breathing apparatus. Otherwise, survival is measured in minutes.) {{/rollBetween() oracle-subcategory-planet-desert-world 11 25}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-subcategory-planet-desert-world 26 40}} Corrosive (This planet's atmosphere is deadly to humans. As a bonus, it can damage exposed skin, materials, plastics, and metals over time.) {{/rollBetween() oracle-subcategory-planet-desert-world 26 40}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-subcategory-planet-desert-world 41 70}} Marginal (It's unhealthy to breathe this planet's atmosphere for more than a few hours at a time.) {{/rollBetween() oracle-subcategory-planet-desert-world 41 70}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-subcategory-planet-desert-world 71 95}} Breathable (This atmosphere is not perfect, but it's good enough to sustain human life.) {{/rollBetween() oracle-subcategory-planet-desert-world 71 95}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-subcategory-planet-desert-world 96 100}} Ideal (This planet's atmosphere is ideally suited to human life. It's literally a breath of fresh air.) {{/rollBetween() oracle-subcategory-planet-desert-world 96 100}}{{/rollTotal() tableChoice 0}} {{#rollTotal() tableChoice 1}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-subcategory-planet-desert-world 1 50}} None (This planet's atmosphere is ideally suited to human life. It's literally a breath of fresh air.) {{/rollBetween() oracle-subcategory-planet-desert-world 1 50}} {{#rollBetween() oracle-subcategory-planet-desert-world 51 60}} Orbital settlement (This planet's atmosphere is ideally suited to human life.
